subject: Submission Due 10th July : FICC 2020 (San Francisco, United States)
body:
Dear Colleague,

We would like to let you know that the paper submission due date for FICC 2020 is July 10, 2019.

Please consider and plan for submitting papers and encourage your colleagues, research group members and fellow scientists to contribute and participate in this conference. 

Future of Information and Communication Conference (FICC) 2020 will be held from 5-6 March 2020 in San Francisco, United States. Conference Tracks are Communication, Data Science, Ambient Intelligence, Networking, Computing, Security and Privacy. Topics are listed here

FICC 2020 proceedings will be published in Springer series "Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing" and submitted for indexing to ISI Proceedings, EI-Compendex, DBLP, SCOPUS, Google Scholar and Springerlink. The publications within "Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing" are primarily proceedings of important conferences, symposia and congresses. They cover significant recent developments in the field, both of a foundational and applicable character.

Complete details are available on the website : https://saiconference.com/FICC

Regards,
Kohei Arai,
Program Chair
FICC 2020

Unsubscribe
